channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Racist and vulgar grafiti on the stairs in St Vincent House, 30th November
item.description:
Racist and vulgar grafiti on the stairs in St Vincent House Between 0 and 1 floor

item.title: Bags of rubbish dumped by the litter bin on Picardy Road Belvedere DA17 near the 401/469 Bus Stop, 30th November
item.description:
Several bags of rubbish have been dumped by the litter bin on Picardy Road Belvedere DA17 near the 401/469 Bus Stop, approximately 25 metres from the junction with Halt Robin Road Belvedere. Would arrangements be put in place to remove the rubbish as soon as practical.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Picardy Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Both playground round-a-bouts are very stiff and seized, 30th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanton Close, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Two bags of litter collected by residents of Regent Square Belvedere DA17 6EP, 30th November
item.description:
Two bags of litter collected by residents of Regent Square Belvedere DA17 6EP from the Square & Upper Park Road have been left on the pavement adjacent to the green, opposite No21 Regent Square. Would arrangements be put in place to collect the bags of litter as soon as practical.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Regent Square, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
